name: Bravo
description:
What does it mean to be Bravo? The standard, most common definition: a shout of approval, often to praise a performance. Sounds good. But we don’t do “standard, most common.” So here’s a more unusual definition: describes fierce, courageous or bold actions. Better, and closer to what we do. Deliver bold, BusinessUnusual ideas that result in BravoResponses that grow brands, create impact and make our clients shine. Bravo does that; Bravo bold.
And we do it in advertising, digital, shopper marketing and strategic planning. We craft it all from our Mothership in Miami and via our teams in New York, Chicago, Minneapolis and San Francisco. Some of our partners: Chevron, Coca-Cola, MillerCoors, General Mills, Pfizer, SC Johnson, Unilever, Wendy’s, and Winn-Dixie. Want more data? Swing by our triple W (bebravo.com) and let’s be Bravo together.
